name: Reality Rash
description: Reality Rash is a 3D beat 'em up inspired by classics such as Jackie Chan Stuntmaster, Streets of Rage, and TMNT... Action takes place in 4 different worlds each one with unique enemies! Play solo or in 2 player co-op, It’s a nostalgic and modern beat 'em up!

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Challenge Accepted
Project Gotham Racing: Ferrari Edition
description: Project Gotham Racing: Ferrari Edition is a spin-off of the main Project Gotham Racing series and this release is exclusive to Zune. The game contains single-player and multiplayer races with twelve exotic sports cars licensed from Ferrari. In single-player there are regular races in 33 events in the career mode as well as time trials. In the time trials it is possible to race against ghost cars and share records with friends. Multiplayer lets the player race against up to three players in wireless network races. The racing tracks are set in London, New York and Tokyo. The game makes use of touch for controls. There are two virtual buttons, one in the bottom right (acceleration) and one in the bottom left (brake) of the screen, along with a handbrake in the middle. Steering is done by tilting the device.

name: Grand Foodventure
description: This game will satisfy your inner food lover's hunger!

name: The Preschoolers: Season 1
description: Preschoolers is the first Nintendo Switch children cartoon mixed with a color book. Listen to a story of a noisy neighbour who gets a well deserved lesson in humility. Join the Preschoolers on a heartwarming visit to the ZOO and learn why even rowdy mo…

name: Owl Rescue
description: Owl Rescue sounds the alarm! A class full of young post owls has been kidnapped! Help their teacher Keeper discover their whereabouts. Follow the trail of the kidnapper through a mix of Hidden Object and Match 3 gameplay. Discover the clues that will lead you to the thief with the help of companion Bella. Take flight with Owl Rescue today!

name: Star Wars: Open World
description:
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
We are uprooted from our home and thrown into this galaxy far, far away for the first time, experiencing it from an outsider's perspective. Abducted by slavers and recovering from the initial shock we are left with no choice but to join a small crew planning an escape from captivity, all the while the rising tide of the newly founded galactic empire sweeps across the galaxy!

Embark on an engaging choice-driven story which will take you across different planets in the Star Wars universe during the very early years of the galactic empire and their push for supremacy.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2012
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2014
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Championship 2008
World Soccer Winning Eleven 2006 Arcade Championship
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Game Style 2003
World Soccer Winning Eleven Arcade Game Style
Dance of Decapods
description: A minimalist single screen bullet hell where your space insect must survive waves of enemies. Evolve to fight back with more than 30 different parts, from bio weapons to bullet enhancement.

name: Open Course
description: Fun Exciting Island Golf! Test your ability on this challenging island golf course, where precision is needed for every shot!!!

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 2014: Aoki Samurai no Chousen
description: A Japan-exclusive port of Pro Evolution Soccer 2014 focused in career development.

name: World Soccer Winning Eleven 9: Liveware Evolution
MarbleVerse
description: Dive into MarbleVerse! An exciting, nostalgic marble racing game where players can have fun while participating in exhilarating races. Empowered by cutting edge blockchain technology, players in MarbleVerse can race their Marbles against one-another and earn rewards for their victories. Design your tracks! Win Races! Upgrade your Marbles to participate in more races and become the leader of the MarbleVerse!

name: Super Phantom Cat: Super Nyan Edition
Override: Mech City Brawl - Super Chared Edition
Tsuri Spirits: Tsutte Asoberu Suizokukan - Digital Deluxe Edition
Super Robot Wars 30: Digital Ultimate Edition
Super Robot Wars 30: Digital Deluxe Edition
Dragon Ball Z: Kakarot + A New Power Awakens Set - Ultimate Edition
King of Water
description: Bigger fishes swallow smaller fishes. hunt or be hunted. Evolve by the time. Interact with both water environment and land environment. More than 10 different types of fishes. Complex conditions from the land. Mysterious Monsters. Complex and interesting game elements interaction.

name: Infinity War Land
description: "Infinity War Land" is a roguelite dungeon shooter.

name: Cross the Log Bridge
description: You control a character on a bicycle. and ride up, down, and jump through a three-dimensional course. and jump through three-dimensional courses. There are more than 30 different courses!

name: Mikos Wish
description: Novelty three consumer development, unique capsule system, and special CG transformation system, are you still heartbroken?

name: Doraemon Story of Seasons: Friends of the Great Kingdom - Deluxe Edition
ABC Follow Me: Animals - Extended Edition
ABC Match with Me: Extended Edition
Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Digital Deluxe Edition
Nobunaga's Ambition: Rebirth - Digital Deluxe Edition
Black Widow: Looking for Love
description: It's impossible not to be eclipsed by a mysterious woman and, although she may not be trustworthy, her charms have piqued your interest and you want her to give you a chance. She wants to be sure that you are the right person for her.

name: Airport Flight Administrator Simulator & Air Traffic-Sky Airplane Sim Plane
description: Play the game and get to know what it feels like to be employed at an airport! In Airport Administrator Simulator you get the chance to experience the life of an airport employee. You will be responsible for taking care of the airport.

name: Vari Dungeon
description: Explore infinite random dungeons with amazing retro pixel art graphics ! Find the best build by testing all the power-ups available, and don't forget to look for all the secrets !

name: Tahoe Dragon: The Beginning
description: They warned us in the 1980s, "You don't want to know what is down at the bottom of lake Tahoe." The year is 2042. And earthquake beneath the lake removed rocks from underwater tunnels that set the beast free.

name: Metal Earth Ashes of the Alliance
CocoRally Ultimate
description: The NEXT Generation Of Racing Games!

name: Bid Whist: Card Game
description: Bidding and predicting wins are what make playing Bid Whist fun and exciting, whether you win or lose.

name: Bricks Breaker Puzzle Classic
description: Easy and minimal game play! Most addictive! Enjoy the most exciting moment!

name: Iron Maiden Quiz
description: A multiple choice quiz about the British rock band Iron Maiden

name: RCPG
description: RCPG is an arcade combat-racing game, where you drive remote controlled cars that speed through amazing tracks with combat abilities.

name: Trafficker: 4th Generation Warfare
description: The trafficker character is a new character class that allows you to discreetly make all sorts of illicit transactions: buying weapons, military equipment or various objects, forging papers, informing about scandals, putting you in touch with illegals, ...

name: Dark Desire 4
description: This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Train Simulator: Huddersfield Line - Manchester: Leeds Route
description: The challenging and stunning Pennines await in Train Simulator, with the new Huddersfield Line: Manchester - Leeds route!

name: Lords and Peasents
description: Lords & Peasants is a medieval real-time strategy and city building game developed by Inverted Cat Games. It has both single and multiplayer modes with up to 16 Players. Start out as a lord of a small village and develop it into a prospering city. Manage your city and rule over the peasants. Forge alliances and intimidate your enemies. Recruit an army and conquer the lands to create your kingdom.

name: Neolithic First City-States
description: Neolithic: First City-States is a Historical Strategy Game. Though Neolithic doesn't fall easily into popular strategy genres, the game is heavily influenced by games such as Age of Empires, Civilization, Caesar III, and to a lesser extent games like RimWorld. The game includes aspects of City-Building, RTS-like gameplay and deeper characters. It is essentially a full-time solo dev project.

name: ElementForger
description: Element forger is a RogueLite mowing game with unique experience. The author is ingenious in this game in the integration of economic system and selection strategy. Players need to master the rhythm of the game to enjoy a good mowing experience. Look forward to your wonderful performance!

name: West Fantasy
description: Western Fantasy is an independent game based on cowboys and post-modern science fiction. The story takes place in A.D2573, players will play the protagonist "River*Clint" and embark on exciting adventures in the overhead world called the western continent.

name: Lady in tomb: Beneath the ocean
description: A first-person adventure game. The Story continues from Lady in Tomb. Gu Jiuxun became the new Gulady. But since then, she has stepped into the curse of "die before 30 years old". In order to save her, Hu Nian determined to find the immortal medicine in the undersea tomb where Xu Fu is buried.

name: Tales of TianYuan Dynasty
description: It is a martial arts fantasy RPG game.The world is so wide, you will choose to continue to raise the sword of chivalry on the journey, or stay away from the chaos and be alone. After the wind blows, how do you choose?

name: Rounders
description: Are you a genius? Are you confident in your mind? Then join the genius game! The wonderful experience of wits should not be missed! The game tells the story of a frustrated man who was laid off by the company and inadvertently crossed into a different world.

name: Dreamed Away
description: A walking simulator in which you control a mentally ill hero. You must escape the "something'' you encounter and return to the original world as you know it. Explore the map while running away from "something" and find a way to escape.

name: Qianling Mainland
description: This is a XianXia game with a high degree of freedom. You are an ordinary youth in the 21st century, one day you are accidentally forced from modern society to send Xianxia different world - Qianling mainland. From now on ordinary life ushered in a gorgeous turn!

name: Permanent Sleep
description: Permanent sleep is a roleplaying detective adventure game. Players will play the role of detective Kylin and police Jonas, and investigate the mysterious serial murders as well.

name: Zombie Age
description: Welcome in this defense-action game of Zombie Age. Now is the time to see you in action. Imagine that you are watching TV and you hear strange sounds from outside.

name: Night of The Full Moon: Memory in mirror
description: Set before Diary of Little Red Riding Hood, Black Swan stumbles upon a magical mirror and is sucked into the Mirror World. On her way to escape from the Mirror World, Black Swan discovers that she is not the only one trapped and with the help of her friends, she begins to search for her memories...

name: ZI Survival
description: You are stranded in the vast expanse of the island. Alone, without any means to call for help, you must do what you can to survive. Explore The land as you hunt for supplies to craft the tools, weapons, and base you’ll need to stay alive. Stay Alive!

name: You Are the Dinner
description: "You Are The Dinner" is an immersive action rougelike game where you can feel the psychology of a young soldier trying to fulfill his duties in a city full of zombies and try to keep him alive. But it's no easy task with millions of zombies pouring in on you.

name: Yako
description: A 2D platformer mixing traditional animation, story-telling, and wind-powered abilities.

name: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream
description: Woten DX: Traveller's Dream is a 2D puzzle-platformer imbued with the spirit of discovery! Dive headfirst into a rich and enchanting world full of charm, challenge and intrigue!

name: Word Attack
description: A board game which challenges you to form words from sets of letters. Play at your own pace or against the clock, on your own or against other players.

name: Wizards, Knights & Archers
description: Defend your townships Energy Orbs with your fellow AI helpers and your trusty pet against waves of invading fantasy creatures who home-in on your Orbs energy and want to take its power for themselves.

name: Virtual Sailor NG
description: Virtual Sailor NG is an open world sailing simulator with accurate physics, simulating well the various boats included. The game allows the user to modify and experiment with scenery making and vehicle design by way of extreme mod ability, with a large library of existing mods and add-ons.

name: Vanquish
description: This is Vanquish! A top-down pixel art shooter where you play as either an Orc Warrior or a Gnome Magician which have both crashed onto a cursed island.

name: Totally Rad Metal Detector League
description: With nothing but the hum of your metal detector for company, explore in splendid isolation for that hidden treasure. Share that unique blend of tranquillity and anticipation with friends in online co-op - or dial up the intensity and race rivals to totally rad treasures in this metal detecting sim!

name: Necroffense
description: This is a game in which you use necromancy to control your soldiers and defeat enemy armies. Choose one of the random options to strengthen your troops. Push back the onrushing enemy army and destroy them!

name: Rezzil Player
description: Rezzil Player is an ever-growing collection of sports training games that will improve your performance and reaction times across a wide range of sports. Designed to be used by anyone who strives to win, whether that’s in the local park against your friends or on the field in front of the world.

name: Rikki Kuu
description: Design & pilot combat drones among the remains of a broken moon battered in an asteroid field. Rikki Kuu is a third-person, physics-based 6DOF-style vehicular combat game set in a destructible, procedurally-generated environment.

name: Rising Star: The Horse Game
description: Rising a Star is a relaxing horse care simulator game with immersive horsemanship tasks and management features. Your grandpa owns a stable which was the place one of the most important equestrian academies of Tuscany. But now you're old enough to take care of it.

name: Rite of Titans
description: Rite of Titans is a Free to Play hero-centric 3v3 action game - currently in the alpha stage. Master the moves and outplay your rivals in an epic, fast-paced hybrid of arcade sports and ability-based competition. See you in the arena!

name: Ronin's Run
description: A 3D side-scrolling Beat ‘em up set in Feudal Japan inspired by classic arcade games and samurai films. As rōnin Sen Takashi you have to avenge the death of your master killed during a raid on your quiet farming village.

name: Robospierre
description: Adventure yourself and solve puzzles in this challenging sokoban with Robospierre and his bird! This journey is filled with several twists in the classical sokoban gameplay, continuosly renewing the experience and complementing the hand drawn graphics in an immersive story.

name: Tokyo Stranger
description: Tokyo Stranger is an aerial genre of text horror game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games. You play as a tourist from an exotic country, looking for any possibility to escape Tokyo in a static world.

name: Timepunk
description: Stuck in the past with a portal gun? Rock some dinosaurs, collect their matter, travel forth in time, kick some knightly ass in the medieval times, decide if you want to prevent or cause World War II, and blast your way back to get to the Society of Time in this crazy bullet hell roguelike!

name: The Reaper Saga
description: Welcome to The Reaper Saga, you will have to investigate the disappearance of people and fight monsters, along the way to become stronger!

name: The Ocean Will Have Us All
description: The Ocean Will Have Us All is a first person exploration game.Experience a day in the subatomic life of Moira Leech. Get up, go to work, go home, go back to sleep. Or. Go off the the beaten track! Take charge! Stick your finger in an electrical socket!

name: The Longest Path
description: The Longest Path is a casual exploration and mini game filled world with procedurally generated biomes and real-world influenced locations. A casual metaverse like game with various play styles. The Longest Path is what you choose it to be!

name: The Life of Arthur
description: The Life of Arthur is a story-based game with philosophical themes. No combat. Some puzzle-solving. Philosophical choices. For those interested in philosophical ideas, especially the philosophy of Arthur Schopenhauer.

name: The Legend of Young
description: Immortal Survivors is an independent rougelite ancient style game. Players can choose different teammates to form a special combat team and continuously upgrade and evolve in the battle with monsters to create their own model. Currently in the EA test, QQ group: 871333851

name: The King of Dice
description: A unique Richman-like multiplayer turn-based competitive game. In the game you have to roll dice to move around the map and use dice to gain different skills to beat other people.

name: The Hunt
description: Challenge your reflexes in this high speed high action combat racing game. Hunt wanted war criminals, raid automated mining facilities, race other head-hunters & scavenge for scraps to upgrade your hunter-craft & reach new racing tracks in the decaying remains of a once glorious civilization.

name: Slaves
description: A man who dies in an accident gets reincarnated into a parallel world to fight evil!

name: RetroRange
description: A casual retro cyberpunk sandbox first-person shooter with object destructive physics.

name: Retro Drive
description: Follow the journey of a college kid, who always seems to get left behind. He recently got held back after class, but his friends are already out party'n! This is no way for you to spend your best years, and you drive with the sheer determination to catch up with them.

name: Repit 2
description: The new Repit has become more interesting and less logical, the new (old redesigned) levels are more focused on interesting and unexpected passing

name: Monocity
description: Monocity is a multiplayer real estate board game. In each round: All players roll the dice together and move. The player who bids the highest price gets the land. Collect resources, build buildings, upgrade them, increase population, use cards, trade with players, and more.

name: My Giant Friend
description: A short visual novel about a girl who meets a giant woman in order to grow. Grow, Grow, Grow until no men are able to disrespect her. Contains comedy.

name: The Henchmen
description: The Henchmen is a pulp-inspired, 90s fueled top-down, action retro open-world game set in the fictional city of New Queens during 1979 and 1991.

name: The Good Chicken
description: Chickens fighting chickens, in 2D! Chicken based PvP platform combat.

name: The Asafo Journey
description: Become Asafo in this action adventure platformer. Chaos is corrupting the lands of the Nile valley and it's up to you to restore the balance. Run, jump and fight your way to the hidden enemy.

name: Spin Quest: A Slot Adventure
description: Experience a unique mix of RPG and slot games!

name: Spinner Invaders 2: A Mad Revenge
description: Shoot your way through a thrilling action adventure of 120 waves in 4 different game modes while fighting against waves of enemies and 12 extreme bosses. Save the world from a new mystery threat by yourself or with a friend locally and play 10 different Challenges.

name: Space Voyage: The Puzzle Game
description: Space Voyage is a puzzle game that doubles as a cinematic experience. Click and drag the given items, tools and teleporters to plan a perfect path for your spaceship to safely reach the end portal. Over 100 levels, colorblind assistance, no reading ability needed.

name: Smash Hyper Drive
description: It's 2025 and the country's mega research facility has gone bad. You are a lowly security guard gunning for his paycheck. Fight your way out in this twin-stick shooter. Reminiscent of Smash TV and the likes of Xeno Crisis.

name: Slink & Snatch: Tales of Thievery
description: Unleash your inner thief in this VR stealth collectathon. As Slink, sneak, grapple and glide to explore every nook and cranny of a mysterious town in search of an arcane secret - and other people’s treasure, of course. All with the help from Snatch, your demon-grappling-gauntlet.

name: Slender Myth
description: After years of being dormant the myth is put to the test and unfortunately it is true. Explore the forest, piece together the past of this cursed place and put the myth to rest once and for all. This task won't be easy as you are not the only one within the forest. Based on character by Eric Knudsen

name: Protorunner
description: Short and sweet 3D parkour game. Run, jump, climb and wall run in a minimalist world and get in the flow with satisfying mechanics. Prove your skills in varied challenges and try to finish them as fast as you can.

name: Project R
description: You will have to infiltrate your way through the security cameras and scan every possible hint, in order to find out about his obscure activities. Night after night you will have to observe the increasingly bizarre and terrifying events.

name: Project Luna
description: This is a game about exploration and discovery Project Luna uses science heavily to a point where you can sell elements on the elemental market at certain stations and outposts.

name: Project 44: Enlightenment
description: p44: Enlightenment the Boy somehow gets free with a little help of the light... his new best friend and saviour. Can he escape the orphanage and find out the truth?

name: Prince Akazaka x Princess
description: Prince Akihiko from modern kingdom Akazaka alongside with his wife, princess Aechara from modern kingdom Andong got isekaid into medieval isekai world from their modern world. This isekai world got attacked by demon queen, Prince Akihiko and Princess Aechara decided to save all princesses.

name: Primal Roar: Jurassic Dinosaur Era
description: Primal Roar - Jurassic Dinosaur Era it's a Single Player VR game that takes you into the Jurassic age! Meet the most popular dinosaurs and learn amazing facts about them. Take a part in a dinosaur hunt and feel a PRIMAL ROAR.

name: Pogo Rage: The Awakening
description: A True Trial For Brave Masochists.

name: Bedtime Horror Stories
description: Late night. A young man called Sam is home alone. He finds a mystical book that takes him into a world of horror stories that come alive. Start reading, but you must not break the most important rule. Once you have started the book, you must finish it!

name: Street Boy
description: Travel across Jamaica's beautiful Portland parish by foot or handcart! Help Arlinton find his calling and save his community from troublesome thugs.

name: Void Titan
description: A unique side scroller with roguelike elements, collect and craft in order to stop giant, terraforming machines that consume the world behind you.

name: World War Battle Simulator
description: WWBS is a strategy game where you can assume first-person control over any unit fighting on the field of battle. Apply the right strategy to different maps and directly support your troops on the frontlines!

name: Wild Isles
description: Wild Isles is a relaxing first person, nature walking simulator. Each Island is procedurally generated, and full of tranquil forests, stunning vistas, spectacular sunsets, and peaceful ocean waves. Lose yourself in the beauty and sounds of nature, explore the island and collect flowers.

name: What's Your Emergency
description: What's your emergency is a game where you take the boots of a 911 operator. In it you will be presented with different emergencys, your task is aid the victims. You will be able to do this through dialogs with the victim and using the new computer application called "Emergency_Manager_2.0".

name: Moon Split Island: Dungeon Adventure
description: Moon Split Island is an open-world adventure. Alone or in a company, explore the island, climb steep slopes, and explore deep canyons. Find mysterious treasures and discover passages to the underworld.

name: X-Racing
description: Upgrade your car, ram your opponents, decide things, step on the gas, play without rules, become the king of roads and streets!

name: Rose City Revenge: The Beginning
description: Jane's father is seriously injured during an attack. With crime out of control and realizing that nothing will be done, Jane decides to track down the criminals. This will result in going through the criminal underworld in Rose City and taking down bosses one by one along the way.

name: Wrangel Island
description: A survival game set in the Ice Age where man and animal collide, work together with others or attempt to survive alone in these frozen lands.

name: Robot Rejects
description: Saw-slicing, metal-melting, steel-on-steel robot destruction! In this robot battle arena game, create and customize your own fighting robot and pit it against rival bots in an online multiplayer battle arena!

name: Near Sol
description: Space 4X game with the ability to build factories, extract resources, with characters, internal and external markets ... Take part in the discussion of the game, share your vision.

name: Wok Planet
description: The great confrontation between two civilizations!

name: The Lord of the Parties x Amane Momo
description: “Amane Momo”, a Vtuber who likes playing video games,singing, and eating delicious food has joined The Lord of the Parties!

name: Revengers
description: CO-OP Openworld FPS set in a fictional Khiribi island located in beautiful environment of the Carribean sea run by warlord Dalian. Explore the environment, fight his bloodthirsty mercenaries, liberate outposts and learn some ancient powers that will help you to bring justice and glory to this land!

name: Party Quest
description: Party Quest is a 2D MMO platformer chalked full of mini games (Party Quests), secrets, and more! Each unique Party Quest that you find and unlock will challenge you and your fellow party members to accomplish various tasks in a set time limit.

name: Over-Run
description: A modern twist of a Zombie Round Base Multiplayer Game, can you survive

name: Outranked
description: Take up quick battles against your friends in groups of 4 up to 20 people, in this sometimes chaotic but very strategic team-versus-team capture-the-flag game. In Outranked, each player gets one of their team's ranks, to capture the opposing team's flag and bring it back to their own team's base.

name: Out of the Woods
description: Out of the Woods is a forest survival simulation with elements of realism. We will face an extremely serious and dangerous adversary - nature itself and its boundless forces. However, the pocket encyclopedia and your ingenuity will help to cope with all the difficulties and get out of the forest

name: Order of Battle: Allies Victorious
description: Allies Victorious is the last part of the Allied trilogy for Order of Battle. The new DLC depicts battles from the Allied Normandy landings in summer 1944 to the end of the war in Europe.

name: Operator
description: OPERATOR is a game about escape, self destruction, manipulation of the world and overcoming a manufactured inhuman foe. The player makes their way across the strange architecture of Installation Jade, changing it as they go, attempting to escape the grasp of the Director. Can you?

name: Magic Kingdom War DLC-2
description: Farquhar Skill: Eliminate Deal 1.5 times damage to a single enemy. If the enemy's HP is lower than 30%, kill it directly.

name: Magic Kingdom War DLC-1
description: Thomson Skill: Cool Down Deals 1.75 times the damage to all enemies and reduces the rage of all enemies by 5.

name: Lovelorn Sanatorium I
description: This is a role-playing game, the game adopts the expression of dynamic comics. You can play the game by dragging similar to the comics.

name: Light
description: A 2D Lighting Speed Collision Based Fighting Game.

name: Let's Seduce the Heroine!
description: A girl is reincarnated into the villainess of an otome game. In order to avoid her scripted demise, she realizes she has to seduce the heroine! A yuri visual novel with a twist.

name: Last Stand
description: Last Stand is a tactical defense game where you must defend humanity against the undead zombie horde. Construct your army’s defenses by building walls, turrets and towers. Thin the zombie horde with explosives devices such as land mines, bazookas and air strikes. Upgrade your squads skills and arm them with powerful weapons and armor.

name: Last Chance Market
description: When a grocery list becomes a struggle to survive against cosmic horrors, will you make it through the door? Stay alive, solve the mystery and make your offerings - or end up on a missing person poster in this first-person, non-linear nightmare. But you'd better hurry, the store's closing soon.

name: Spellgroove
description: Dance, style, and spellcast your way through hordes of dazzling and dangerous baddies on your way towards fame and glory in this groovy discofest! There's one catch though, all your spells get randomized every 30 seconds!

name: Snow Vale
description: Can you survive on cold dangerous wastelands?

name: Smash Therapy
description: A modular therapeutic experience that rewards you for smashing stuff. Choose your weapon, enter the Rage Room, and Smash everything!

name: Dakar Desert Rally: Audi RS Q e-tron Hybrid Car
description: Get your hands on the off-road futuristic prototype with an innovative drivetrain concept and Dare to Drive into the future of rally racing with the all-new Audi RS Q e-tron.

name: Destroy All Humans! 2: Reprobed - Challenge Accepted
description: Rise to the challenge and test your skills in this DLC that includes all 4 Challenge Modes from Destroy All Humans! (2020) Also included: numerous new Mutators that let you alter the rules of the game!

name: Furry Sex: GameDev Story
description: Furry Sex - GameDev Story is a casual adult tetris gameYou need to pass levels of casual tetris game and earn enough points to open amazing adult arts and videos with our furry female protagonists.

name: Lands of Xon
description: Lost in an alien world, surrounded by unfamiliar landscape and foreign technology, you need to find the way back home. Explore, discover and solve the mysteries of this strange place.

name: Dungeon & Adventure
description: Dungeon & Adventure is an adventure game with puzzle and first-person shooter elements.

name: Dark Flow
description: Three bandits kidnaped a girl, bring her to an abandoned building and wait for a ransom, they chose the right victim but chose the wrong place.

name: The Room
description:
Occult...Do you believe in it?

Would you sacrifice someone to prolong your life?

The story of 'The Room' follows our occult loving protagonist who gets an apartment for a very cheap price.
For the first few days everything seemed fine, but then weird things start happening when some special conditions are met.

What are these conditions?

What exactly is happening in the apartment?

name: Lisa: The Wise
description: Lisa: The Wise is a fan game based on Lisa: The Painful

name: WanderVR
description: WanderVR is an exploration game with puzzle and combat elements, intended to push VR to its limits when it comes to a player's exploration freedom. Made by Kaya Cady

name: The Woodworker
description: The Woodworker is a moody first-person simulation adventure set in a dark urban world teeming with business opportunity.

name: The Twilight of Infinity Episode 5: Flight into Yesterday - The Disappearance of Amelia Earhart
description: What happened to Amelia Earhart and Fred Noonan? Where did their plane go? A mystery that remains to this day, perhaps Alex and Professor Emit could have the answer..

name: StickmanThug3D
description: This guy is purely a rebel. Stickman: Thug 3D unleashes the anger in your heart. Be a rich guy, overcomes difficulties, cool combat system, hot chicks, jewel collection, all skills and equipments are available. At this stage, the EA version will continue to be updated. . .

name: Sticc
description: Sticc is a multiplayer physics-based stickman fighting game.

name: Star Fetchers : Episode 1
description: The next thrilling episode of Star Fetchers, with grimier plot and more obscure conspiracies.

name: Skin
description: SKIN is an otherworldly stealth game where you hunt monsters in a nightmare forest. You are Artemis, and you will summon an Eternal Night.

name: Sir Squire
description: Sir Squire is a casually competitive game for two players. Go head to head with your friends in medieval times to see who can collect their feast or claim the land first.

name: Single Feather
description: A game about a duck and a scientist who don't get along. This cute platformer is one that can be enjoyed by the whole family. Progress through the story to unlock options in the level editor. Share levels with friends or with a community of other players.

name: Sagger
description: This is a free part of the Sagger game - historical simulator that will give you control over all Israel resources to face the Yom Kippur War. With the help of your advisor and knowledge, you will acquire, make the crucial decisions that will lead the state of Israel to Victory or Defeat.

name: Saga Cube
description: A fun and casual puzzle platformer where you play as Heuggy the little mouse. Alongside Koda the fox, you travel the world in search of cube fragments in order to restore the harmony between humans and foxes.

name: Russian Soldier Simulator
description: View a war as it is seen by an individual soldier with Russian Soldier Simulator - a gaming experience evoking historical conflicts involving the Russian military. Customize your playthrough and get lost in inspiring quotations.

name: Rush Red & Blue
description: In this game, the player and a bot race in the cyberspace. The first car to finish 2 laps wins. There are two arrows and a prop in the track. Use these to complete the race faster!

name: Ruffhouse VR Basketball Simulator
description: Ruffhouse VR is the first full-game basketball simulator of its kind. Flawless dribble and shot mechanics, crowd reactions, referee commentary, player entourages, dunk flares, full-court competition and much more. It’s time to bring real-life dynamic streetball into your home!

name: Red Fox and the Four Seasons: Typing Game
description: You can become a typing master with the help of this game. One huge benefit: The more you use our typing game, the faster you will be able to type the most frequent words faster, and you will be able to type everything else faster as well!

name: Rebel Inc: Escalation - Sand & Secrets
description: Control the Oil. Control the Region. Take command and stabilise Golden Sands, a vast desert of riches. Uncover secrets in four new official scenarios, from stealthy insurgents to supercharged tanks and even oil infernos.

name: RC Dash
description: Dash to a high score in this racing platformer to become #1 on the leaderboards.

name: Quiet Town
description: Explore a wildness world full of strange creatures, relics and resources. Lumber, mine, build, fight, craft and farm to survival in this stranger land.

name: Puzzle: Triangles
description: Puzzle: Triangles - The game is a challenging and interesting puzzle game.

name: Psychedelia: The PsychoNought
description: Trippy Clever Funny Relaxing Adventure For someone looking to kick back and relax and get immersed in a psychedelic world.

name: Play with Me 2: On the Other Side
description: It is the sequel to the game Play with Me: Escape room. Use again the available objects in your room, outwit tricky illusions and optical puzzles and above all, answer the question – will you play with me too?

name: Play Pretend
description: Delve into the imaginations of your friends on the school playground. Collect cool Ideas to upgrade your imaginary powers - or create your own! Combine Ideas to create wacky and powerful combos. Befriend your classmates, play as them or against them, and spend your days Playing Pretend!

name: Planet U
description: An attractive and shape changing adventure

name: Pizza Simulator
description: "Anyone who says that money cannot buy happiness has clearly never spent their money on pizza". Pizza Simulator gives you an opportunity to open and manage a pizza restaurant of your dreams. It's all in your hands. Toss it, flip it, make it. Create your pizza empire!

name: Pixel Starships 2
description: Pixel Starships 2; the sequel to the popular Pixel Starships game is currently in development. Please add to your wishlist to receive the latest updates.

name: Pixelmancer
description: Pixelmancer is a casual roguelite game developed by a single developer. You play as a necromancer with pets that will aid on your journey, you can upgrade almost anything for your hero and your pets. You will die constantly but become stronger and better with every death. How far can you go?

name: PhD
description: Will you navigate the intricacies of the scientific world to get your PhD?

name: PermaNight
description: Survive in a world full of darkness. Gain resources. Kill entities. Repeat. But beware, there might be entities lurking around...

name: Pax Augusta
description: Be part of important decisions within the Roman empire. Build up a prospering city, take care of your citizens, trade goods or earn money to build impressive monuments and hire advisors. Secure your city, increase your power to become senate and maybe the next emperor?

name: Pathogen: Survival
description: Pathogen: Survival is an arcadey wave based FPS zombie game that prioritises progression and customisation.

name: Nova Tales
description: Nova Tales is a tactical battle game where you summon units from cards to battle your opponent on a turn based battlefield. Use strategic command to thwart you enemies plans!

name: Noodle Samurai
description: You are a monkey samurai who has been captured by a gluttonous demon toad. Using your grapple hook you traverse arenas slaying dangerous ingredients with your trusty blade, cooking and serving them to the demon, lest you become the meal yourself.

name: Nonogram: Girl's Sweets
description: This is a puzzle game called NONOGRAM. Please enjoy cute and sweet anime-like illustrations by solving simple puzzles.

name: Ninja Bricks
description: Ninja Bricks is an action MMORPG where you can cooperate with other players to defend the brick world, participate in PvP arenas full of bullet hell warfare, all while enjoying dashing and cute graphics, along with a character development system that deeply rewards you for your invested time.

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter IV - Sacred Feathers
description: Nina Aquila is back for her brightest, boldest, most magical adventure yet!

name: Night Light
description: Defend against the creatures of that night! Protect yourself and your lamp by building and upgrading your base. Equip yourself with the best weapons to deal with the incoming waves.

name: Nerg Loves Them
description: A surreal action platformer that focuses on the concept of balance. Switch between 2 playable lizards and harmonize their strenghts and weaknesses.

name: Mini Skull
description: An adventure game with interactive storylines.

name: Maiden Kingdom
description: Maiden Kingdom is a lightweight hentai RPG dating simulator set in a fantasy world.

name: Magical Girl D: Futanari RPG
description: Magical girls & futanari - the sexy combo you never knew you wanted! Hentai action and RPG combat blend together to deliver a tantalizing erotic experience.

name: Lunar: The last human
description: Seek the truth and explore the mysterious World after pose-apocalypse, be a guide for "lunar" the last human a lost memory girl blessed by the god with magic power to , A top-down RPG Adventure cure this world back to normal

name: Ludicrous Uprising
description: Join the (ridiculous) adventure of Kaemill and his allies in the attempt of freeing the lands of Prassa from the hands of evil Taeippa in this beautiful pixelart medieval fantasy JRPG with hand-drawn battle scenes and a story that will crack you up.

name: Love n War: Warlord by Chance II
description: Love n War: Warlord by Chance II is a tactical RPG. You are now an Emperor of a vast nation. Strengthen your leadership ability and lead your people to prosperity.

name: Guitar Zeros
description: Guitar Zeros is narrative survival sim where you try to manage your band's hectic life on tour. Take a band from humble beginnings to headliners (and God willing keep them all alive).

name: Grist
description: A sci-fi digital boardgame. Recruit crewmembers to build a deck of Order Cards, then use those cards in combat and tests of skill in order to grow your abilities, overcome challenges, and defeat powerful entities hiding the terrible secrets of the cyber-plague.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East 2: Steel Inferno
description: Steel Inferno puts the spotlight on several major offensives that influenced the course of the war in the East, while opening up new areas of the War in the East 2 map. With 8 new Scenarios and 2 new Campaigns, it will significantly expand your War in the East 2 experience.

name: Fury Turn
description: Save the scientists! Prevent biological catastrophe! Eat all the burgers on the way!

name: Fairy Fencer F: Refrain Chord - Digital Deluxe Edition
Draw a Line Adventure
description: Draw a line adventure is a ridiculous and fresh touch classic platform game. Featuring 36 levels of non-stop fun with easy to learn gameplay. But it's not gonna be easy, levels are harder and harder. Try to grab all coins with limited time and length of your path.

name: Mikey & Grover's Unexpected Adventures
description: Mikey and Grover go on a treasure hunt in a mysterious ancient lighthouse. It seems that everyone in town has a different theory about what is hidden in the lighthouse. The boys don't know what they'll find there, anything is possible. Join them as they embark on a bunch of unexpected adventures!

name: Middle East Empire 2027
description: Lead your Middle Eastern empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Memory's Reach
description: Memory’s Reach is a first person puzzle-adventure metroidvania. Explore labyrinthian megastructures, solve mind-bending puzzles, and wield fantastic alien technology in a quest to reveal the legacy of a doomed civilization.

name: Me in the Office
description: Me in the Office is a sandbox destruction game where you can destroy the large three-floor office in different ways. In this game you are anything but a regular employee in an office. Throw furniture, smash glass, raise a fuss or make employees dance - do anything you want, no one will fire you!

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Greater World
description: Rule the MKW world as never before! From North Africa to Scandinavia, the Greater World is yours to conquer! This update doubles number of playable factions and greatly expands the world map. Completely compatible with MKW Royal Blood. So marshal your armies, my lord, The Greater World awaits.

name: Medieval Alchemist
description: Medieval Alchemist is an alchemist survival game set in the medieval period. Survive against the challenges of nature, collect ingredients, produce potions, sell non-essential ingredients in the market, develop your character and build your living space by hiring workers.

name: Master TRPG
description: A graduate student simulation game that allows students to experience two years of a Master's course.

name: Mark of the Void
description: Turn based RPG game with heavy reliance on strategy and item management. Inspiration from older rpg games with more punishing mechanics but more rewarding for patient and strategic players. Any type of player can play and enjoy, but the more dedicated and curious players will find more reward!

name: Make Them Naked
description: Four precious girls are waiting for you! Flirt with them and play the rhythm game to Make Them Naked. Make a cup of tea and dive into the world of love! The game allows you to play with one hand thanks to an easy control.

name: Lockdown 2024
description: A modern day point-n-click adventure game about a guy who spends a year with seven women locked down in a house due to COVID.

name: Loading...
description: Loading… is a first-person adventure game about the oldest and youngest members of a Vietnamese family living in southern California.

name: Llama the Farm Drama
description: Play as a Llama! Spit on farm animals, farmers and end-cows. Speedrun cozy farms and unique dungeons in this short, fun and light-hearted platformer.

name: Littlelands
description: The Littlelands region is brimming with strange characters and magical landscapes to discover if you know where to look, for a big-headed little youngster like you every moment exploring, growing berries, searching for buried treasures or walking through these lands can be an epic adventure.

name: Linares: Bullet Fever
description: In a world where magical creatures called Alebrije roam the dream lands. You and your friends will be pitted in Mechanized Alebrije mayhem, an intense team based sport.

name: Liminal
description: Liminal is a first-person survival horror game that takes place within a seemingly boundless labyrinth of familiar, yet unsettling environments. Explore a virtually endless procedural environment and experience a world distant from our own.

name: Ladder Larry
description: A challenging retro arcade platformer game, where you need to clear each level in order to progress in the game. Collect items and bonuses and outwit your opponents to reach the end goal. Climb to the top of the highscore leaderboard to brag on your friends!

name: Jump Warrior
description: Jump Warrior is a fun and relaxing game. Many enemies and bosses are waiting for you. How many levels can you reach? Let's jump!

name: In the Dark
description: "In the Dark" is a roguelike deck-building horror card game. Cooperate with and fight against other survivors, collect cards, skills, items, and souls, and use them to survive in the world shrouded in darkness due to the impact of the meteorite, where monsters and zombies have appeared.

name: Inner Call
description: Inner Call is a 2D adventure game where you play as a wise orc and help the locals with their problems. For the last 20 years, the forests have been filled with various monsters, which are now aggravating the villagers.

name: Horde
description: See yourself stuck in the middle of an ever growing virus epidemic. Find or craft weapons and tools to fight against the living and the dead. Build a safe place to survive in this cruel, apocalyptic world.

name: Hold the Line
description: Manage your units, give them formations and prepare for an assault of ever growing waves of enemies. Hold the line and keep your tower standing for as long as possible.

name: Funny Cell Game
description: Funny Cell Game is a rogue-like top-down fighting game, where you fight waves of enemies. Buy upgrades from killing enemies to kill... even more enemies!

name: Fungal Descent
description: Something pulls at your mind. Is it the sensor pinging the parts, or something else? Crash landing on an alien planet, survival depends on modding your gun and creating the ultimate weapon. Find secret areas to uncover mysteries hidden away.

name: Fuktopia 4
description: Fuktopia 4 is a frantic post apocalyptic First Person Shooter.

name: Eclipse of the Moon
description: Eclipse of the Moon has the story of entering a magic school and breaking the coming crisis of reflux. Wear VR to become a student of the academy and prepare for the upcoming threat. The level of difficulty of this game will vary depending on the player's ability

name: Durus
description: A multiplayer rage game. Experience a rage-inducing reflex-based puzzle game on your own or with your friends. Work your way through a campaign at your own pace in casual, or dedicate your life to beating it on challenge mode. Build, play and share your own levels with a fully featured level editor.

name: Dungeon Scavenger 2
description: The adventure continues! With the help of you friends and your trusty charmed companions, venture forth in the new unknown depts. Build a new town like never before with your real life friends and band together to conquer the new depths.

name: Disasters
description: Disasters is a strategy simulation in which you have to avert an impending disaster. Collect research points and spend them on rules to avert disaster. It's up to you whether humanity and planet Earth will survive or whether everything will be destroyed.

name: Die Daddy Die
description: Die Daddy Die is a 3d adventure and platform game in which you control a slime thrown by a Cosmic God, capable of deforming his body at will, solving traps and situations that arise in order to continue advancing.

name: Beach Games
description: Your life is like a fairy tale... You worked hard on your internet startup for the last few years. The dating site you created turned out to be a spectacular success, and you became a millionaire youngster...

name: Back to Home
description: Help the hero to return home in Back to Home! An epic adventure that fuses the Metroidvanias and the Souls Like and makes you travel fantastic places like forgotten caves, high snowy mountains and dark forests created in a “Dirty-Pixel Art” 2D style.

name: Backrooms Hide and Seek
description: Team up with your friends online with this MMO, Massively Multiplayer version of Backrooms. You heard me right. This is Backrooms Hide and Seek Hide, be sneaky and beat the other players online. This game features up to 100 online players around the world. Play as Monsters or Humans

name: MetaCity M
description: MetaCity M is a meta-universe mobile game with a global common server and a semi-sandbox open world. Each planet of MetaCity M has more than 1,600 small towns, 690 secondary cities, 55 primary cities and more than 510 million square meters. Kilometers of huge adventure world. Here, you can be neighbors with your friends, drive, walk, and take a plane every day to explore and travel around the world, go to the mountain tops to watch the sunrise and sunset, and enjoy the changes in spring, summer, autumn and winter, and you can also take an interstellar spacecraft to see various planets. Look, visit other players in different world environments.

name: Devolution: Maken no Ou to Shimobe-tachi
Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Infinity
Wonder Mu: Mu to Unmei no Monster
Mori no Fantasy: Sekaiju no Densetsu
Dasshutsu Game: Neko-sama no Karakuri Garden kara no Dasshutsu
Teppen Banchou Take 1: Saikou no Yankee Ikusei Game
Gekitotsu! Saikyou Pro Yakyuu Dream Battle
Yukkuri Labo: Touhou Yukkuri no Ragdoll Simulator Game
Cyberpunk 2077: Project Orion
description: The Cyberpunk 2077 sequel – codenamed ‘Project Orion’ – will be developed by CD Projekt Red North America, a new studio opening in Boston, USA, and “prove the full power and potential of the Cyberpunk universe”, the company said.

name: The Witcher Remake
description: Previously codename Canis Majoris, The Witcher Remake is built from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5. It is being developed by Polish studio Fool's Theory with veteran Witcher staff and is still early in development.

name: The Witcher: Project Sirius
description: Game developed by The Molasses Flood with support from the CD PROJEKT RED team, set in The Witcher universe. It has been described to tell "an unforgettable story for existing Witcher fans and new audiences." Compared to existing CD PROJEKT RED games, this one is said to "target a much broader audience." Sirius will include both single-player and multiplayer gameplay.

name: Mir2M: The Warrior
description:
MIR2M: The Warrior writes a new legend from the historical point of 'Legend of Mir2',
the legendary K-fantasy RPG game. A new legend sprouts from the origin.

The world where swords decide the winners, the world where heroes who lust for the true martial destiny and battles could grasp all only with swords.
The world that is open to anyone who strives to become stronger.

From extreme training, you could be the most powerful or the richest.
We await you, the one who's destined to be the legendary hero.

name: Tap Wars: Earth Defense Force 4.1 - The Shadow of New Despair
Crazy Hospital
description:
Become a doctor today! Diagnose and treat your patients injuries & ailments, no matter how crazy they are!
Each of your patients have specific injuries or illnesses. They need your help straightaway. Its up to you to locate any boo boo’s and help them get better. Use the stethoscope, syringe, x-ray machine and many other crazy medical tools to diagnose whats wrong with each silly character.
Once you’ve treated all the different injuries for one patient, make sure you perform all the standard check-ups before moving on the your next patient!
What are you waiting for, start treating your disgruntled patients today!

name: Toast the Ghost
description: Toast the Ghost is a retro platformer, with elements of many classic platformers combined into one crazy adventure!

name: Polestar
description: A turn-based RPG with a Fantasy-Western setting, brimming with giant salamanders, sun-soaked rainbow mountains, and saloons scattered across the land. Discover secret symbols, hunt down outlaws, and ride the rails, all in our unique hand-drawn style.

name: Mutants: Genesis
description: Mutants: Genesis is an online card game that you can play solo or with up to 3 players in PvE and PvP modes! Join the next generation of Psycogs and climb the ranks to establish yourself as Champion! Collect hundreds of mutants, fashion your own deck, cooperate with or fight other players!

name: Into the Darkness VR
description: Into The Darkness is a VR action-adventure game built on physics mechanics. Near future. Humanity is trying to achieve immortality by transferring consciousness to machines. Navigate through environments, solve the puzzle, engage enemy... to find out the dark secret behind the experiments.

name: Zombie Hunter Video Game
description: Zombie Hunter Video Game is a plug-n-play shotgun TV game based on AMC's The Walking Dead series released in 2012 by Jakks Pacific and developed by Merge Interactive.

name: EA Sports
description: EA Sports 95' is a plug & play TV game released by Jakks Pacific in 2004. It is a Sega Genesis-style game with two EA Sports games for the Sega Genesis in it.

name: Dragon Ball Z
description:
Plug & Play from Jakks Pacific released in 2005. There are 3 main modes available:

• Buto-Retsuden: Arcade Mode in which you have to compete in 1v1 matches. The sprites look similar to the SNES DBZ games
• Kamehameha Assault: Try to conquer all 7 Dragon Balls in a kind of "pong" clone
• Pinball: Search for secret triggers and collects as much points as possible: you'll unlock a boss fight and if you win, you'll get a Dragon Ball. Conquer all 7 and a wish of yours will come true

name: Jasper's Dream
description: Jasper's Dream is a first person puzzle game set in a techno mystic Egyptian world. Help Jasper, a robot programmed to create games, by solving his mind-bending puzzles. You will also explore an abandonned futuristic pyramid and unravel its many mysteries.

name: I told you
description: A tactical action adventure in which you will have to use stealth and the few resources at your hand to face the forces of a regime that took away the only thing you had left.

name: Is It Wrong to Repay the Debt in a Dungeon?
description: To repay the debt, both Akane and her mother have to earn a lot of money! Explore the dungeon, challenge strong enemies, and even use her own body! Everything she is trying to do is for saving her family!!

name: Inversion Institute
description: A visual novel/puzzle game set in a medieval fantasy world. Using "Magic Ink," you will draw working logical gizmos and contraptions to solve problems for the Institute and surrounding townsfolk. With the help of other characters, you may even invent a machine that will change the world forever.

name: Hidden Desire
description: Hidden Desire is a sexual adventure that encourages lewd lust. Take on the role of a director of erotic films on your way to worldwide fame and provide your companions with a place in the sun.

name: Hero Jumper
description: Hero Jumper is sandbox game where you can destroy objects and do whatever you want.

name: HardCube 2
description: HardCube 2 is an adventure puzzle game. You play as a cute creature that travels through colorful worlds. Each level has its own history, secrets and dangers!

name: Hallway Defender
description: Hallway Defender is a roguelite tower defense where you defend your base from an endless wave of fellow classmates. With over 25 different towers and even more upgrades and effects there are infinite ways to set up your own defenses.

name: InfiniPicross 2.0: Halloween
description: More than a hundred Medium and Large Halloween picross puzzles for the Infinipicross 2.0 game! (Like, 102!)

name: Freerunners
description: Become a freerunner. Find a flow and underlying rhythm of movement through your environment. Vault, climb, jump, duck, swing, flip, slide, do what it takes to travel as fast as possible whilst using your environment to outwit the enemy henchmen and save your friend.

name: Freed Software
description: Freesoft is an IT company simulator. You have to build your own IT empire. Develop your character and your employees. Create the best software in the game world.

name: Executor
description: This game is Psy-fi fiction! Its first person/third person shooter with massive gun battles of robots and you. Robots take power and start full-scale military activity by fixing each others and build new ones but we cant tolerate this any more... Stay sharp.

name: Evil Fate
description: Evil Fate is a first person psychological horror game. A lone cabin in the middle of the nowhere, those two aren't simple. Captured and imprisoned under a structure, he will have to escape.

name: Europe Empire 2027
description: Lead your European empire in an empire building turn based strategy war game. Are you ready to lead, Supreme Commander?

name: Eureka
description: Eureka is an open-world business management simulator. From gold mining to wheat farming, choose your products, manage your resources, and grow your business however you see fit!

name: Epsylon
description: A private eye mystery game where you decide how to solve the case. Use your detective skills to solve the case or rely on the abilities of your little dragon partner to see things from a new angle.

name: Decopins: Asset Fighters Series
description: Decopins (meaning flick in japanese) is a tower defense like game with simple click. Don't let Donuts escape from your donuts shop by Clicking! 20 stages, Hell/Death mode, and more. Level up your Decopin and make full use of your MAGIC.

name: Deadly Desert
description: Deadly desert is a survival story of two men, a young boy and his disabled father. It all started with an unfortunate accident in the middle of Nevada desert. Unfortunately, their car broke down on the way. They were waiting a long time for any help and then decided to take life in their own hands.

name: Dawn of Arba
description: Become a new adventurer in a massive online multiplayer adventure. Explore the new Dawn emerging over the horizon of a new world, ARBA. Although beautiful at first sight, ARBA's history harbors a hidden secret and a much deeper and dangerous truth.

name: Datasight
description: will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe. Your actions will tip the balance during the most dangerous time period mankind has ever known.

name: Darold the Doomer: Back 2 Reality
description: The sequel that takes place in the real world.

name: City Massacre
description: Zombie first-person shooter with elements of survival

name: Child of Aether
description: A 3rd person, quest based, survival horror journey, with a heavy lean on narrative, mystery, exploration and detective work. Uncover the circumstances behind the grim world you awaken in, and in the process learn the truth by piecing together the many character stories clues and puzzles

name: ChaseTag
description: Come participate at ChaseTag ! A tag competition where athletes are candy ! Face your friends in intense Player-versus-Player matches, that will make you sweat !

name: Ceplion
description: Unique platforming mechanics with detailed enemy patterns and combat skills. Explore the Ceplion Island and Uncover the dark truth about its people.

name: AlphaBlue
description: Cross the universe, shoot aliens, upgrade your weapons and face powerful bosses with AB in this retro inspired lateral shoot 'em up to save the world. Adventure into Campaign Mode or face the never-ending waves of Endless Mode with suitable challenges for all skill levels.

name: Alien Invasion
description: Join the battle to save earth from aliens and robots. Choose to play on the side of humans or aliens in battle. 1. Play alongside up to 100 online players 2. Choose various levels 3. Play in various modes such a s capture the king, rush, team deathmatch, conquest.

name: Alice with Gatling
description: This is an exhilarating FPS where you shoot your Gatling Gun and mow down your enemies! Face a horde of monsters as a cute girl "Alice".

name: A Halloween Valentine
description: A Halloween Valentine is a puzzle-adventure pop album set in a haunted amusement park on Valentine's Day.

name: Agenda 21
description: Set amongst the ruins of Joe Biden's America, survival means war. Fight alone or with friends and AI in this brutal third person action game. Everyone from criminal gangs and corrupt cops is out to get you on the streets of Freeside. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: After
description: A real-time open-world post-apocalyptic survival and escape game.
